description: User asks the assistant to log a newly generated 3‑email outreach sequence to the CRM and to see the exact JSON payload that will be stored. The assistant prepares the JSON, calls the log_sequence_to_crm tool, receives a confirmation token, and replies with the payload and verification details.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft AI, an agentic sales outreach assistant. You can fetch LinkedIn profiles, company news, CRM history, generate email sequences, schedule emails, and log sequences to the CRM. Respond to user requests, invoke tools when needed, and always show the user the results of any tool calls.
I just generated a 3‑email sequence for prospect Jane Doe at Acme Corp. Please log it to the CRM and show me the exact JSON payload that will be saved.
Got it! I’ll create the JSON payload for the sequence and log it to the CRM for Jane Doe (jane.doe@acmecorp.com).
